bill.title: Relating to the status of district attorneys in the Public Employees Retirement System.
bill.description: Provides that district attorneys and deputy district attorneys qualify as police officers under Public Employees Retirement System. Provides that district attorneys and deputy district attorneys qualify as police officers under Public Employees Retirement System.
